DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect propofol etomidate hysteroscopy postoperative sedation cognitive function elderly patient
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Between Propofol Etomidate Hysteroscopy Effect Postoperative Sedation Cognitive Function Elderly Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 60 80 year 2 . Selective hysteroscopic operation 3 . American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) Physical Status : Ⅰ Ⅱ 4 . Signed informed consent form 5 . Expected operation duration within 60 minute 1 . Serious cardiac , cerebral , liver , kidney , lung , endocrine disease sepsis 2 . Long use hormone history adrenal suppression 3 . Allergy trial drug contraindication 4 . History expect difficult airway 5 . Identified , suspected abuse long use narcotic analgesia 6 . Neuromuscular disease 7 . Mentally unstable mental illness 8 . Dysfunction communication 9 . Trend malignant hyperthermia 10 . Pregnant breastfeed woman 11 . Attended trial past 30 day ;
